TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, the cupcake are rainbow-flavored! :0

I wish I could think of other things

granted you think of unspeakable horrers

I wish I could watch more mlp

Granted, but the only ones you can find a creepypasta editions

I wish that the pony part of my brain was smaller.

Granted, your whole brain is smaller

I wish to find a good youtube video downloader

Granted, but its full of viruses

I wish that the pony vs non pony war would end.(i wish this for real as well, im tired of not being able to not find it somewhere)(as in the fighting_

Granted. The world is destroyed by aliens, and no one is left to fight.

I wish I had less violent ideas.

Granted, but all you can think about is cuddly things

I wish that I wasnt sick today(lol no i dont)

Granted, but its full of viruses

I wish that the pony vs non pony war would end.(i wish this for real as well, im tired of not being able to not find it somewhere)(as in the fighting_

(you could help by not bringing it up )

Granted, nothing happens

i wish i wasnt sick today

Granted. You get better right as WWIII starts and are now eligible to get drafted.

I wish a ssto spaceplane.

Granted, no fuel

I wish to have an SSTO and fuel

Granted, but the space Kraken eat you

I wish that I was a corgi.

Granted, but you get bit by a rabid squirrel you were trying to chase

i wish to win a noble peace prize

Granted, you cannot play KSP anymore (and WoW)

I wish to know things that I shouldn't know

Granted, But its all stuff that will scar you for life

I wish i was a ksp wow playing hipster ninja corgi

granted, since dogs are usually nude, you become a nudist

I wish life was happy

Granted, but everyone becomes a pony

I wish that I was a Hipster wow playing ninja corgi that wore clothes.

Granted, but you get neutered by your owner

I wish for Michael Jackson to be alive

Granted, he is too ill to make any new songs

I wish I had control over my spacecraft

Granted, but there is a Kraken coming for you.

I wish for you to see this text.

Granted, but I change the colour.

I wish that people who don't like the MLP fandom would stop constantly bringing it up :/ Happens everywhere, makes Kitteh sad

Granted, but now all those people previously whining about MLP start supporting extremist religious views and use those as arguments to start flame wars with 'the ones who are to blame', no matter what the discussion was about. No thread on the internet is ever safe again, hate and intolerance dominate.

I wish I could have complete control over Energy, being able to turn objects into energy and back into objects, or turn the energy into forces like gravity, magnetism, etc.

Granted, The univers simulation crash because this is implying exotic matter

I wish to be able to manipulate exotic matter

Granted, it turns into ordinary matter because of a malfunction

I wish I could make a 3D model

Granted, it's an illegal 3D gun and you get arrested.

I wish for less books.
